gladosPackage

Class AbstractNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • gladosPackage.AbstractNeuron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputNeuron, IntermediateNeuron, OutputNeuron

    public abstract class AbstractNeuron
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that represents a neuron, the fact that it is abstract allows for more flexibility in any NeuralNetwork.
    Author:
    Laty
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double WEIGHT_RANGE
      A manually adjusted value that allows weights to be initialized randomly between WEIGHT_RANGE and -WEIGHT_RANGE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractNeuron() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double activationFun(double x)
      The currently used activation function.
      abstract void calculateNeuronDiff(double expectedOutput)
      Calculates the Neuron gradient and refreshes attribute.
      abstract void fire()
      Calculates and sets the output for this neuron, considering current inputs.
      abstract double getNeuronDiff()
      This method should return the current stored value of the neuron's gradient.
      abstract double getOutput()
      This function should return the current stored output for this neuron.
      abstract java.lang.Double getWeight(AbstractNeuron n)
      Returns the weight associated with the neuron n.
      abstract void incrementWeightDiffs()
      Increments the weight gradient for all the weights in the neuron
      abstract void incrementWeights(double learningRate)
      Increments all the neuron's weight according to its current weight gradients and the given learningRate
      abstract void resetLR()
      Resets the learning rate of every weight to its default value.
      abstract void resetWeightDiffs()
      Resets the weight gradient for all weights in the neuron
      abstract void resetWeightDiffsMomentum(double alphaRate)
      "Resets" the weight gradient for all weights in the neuron according to the momentum method.
      abstract void varyLR(double decreaseLR, double increaseLR)
      Applies the variation of learning rate to every weight of this neuron following a specific law.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getWeight

        public abstract java.lang.Double getWeight(AbstractNeuron n)
        Returns the weight associated with the neuron n. If it doesn't or if this is an InputNeuron, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        n -
        Returns:
